docblock.description: Internal storage for server management URI
Generated JSON data we send off to API
Stored response we received back from API
Stored response code we recieved back from API
Internal array that stores all of the cloud servers you interacted with for chained commands
Internal array that stores all of the files you interacted with for chained commands

tag.name: param
tag.description: user id that will be used for API

tag.name: param
tag.description: key that was generated by Rackspace

tag.name: param
tag.description: location of API use wish to use

tag.name: return
tag.description: return authentication token or false on failure

tag.name: param
tag.description: token you wish to set

tag.name: return
tag.description: returns recieved token

docblock.description: Performs cURL requests (POST,PUT,DELETE,GET) required by API.

tag.name: param
tag.description: HTTP method that will be used for current request

docblock.description: This method is used for processing authentication response.
docblock.long-description: Basically we retrieve authentication token and server management URI from returned headers.

tag.name: param
tag.description: instance of cURL

tag.name: return
tag.description: length of header

docblock.description: Retrieves details regarding specific server flavor

tag.name: return
tag.description: returns JSON string containing details for requested flavor or false on failure

tag.description: requested detailed description of server flavors

tag.name: return
tag.description: returns json string containing available server configurations or false on failure

tag.description: name of new image

tag.description: server id for which you wish to base this image on

tag.description: id of image you wish to retrieve details for

tag.name: return
tag.description: string containing details of requested image

docblock.description: Retrieves all of the available images

tag.description: json string containing server details or false on failure

tag.description: json string containing current limits or false on failure

tag.description: id of server this action is performed for

tag.description: IP you wish to unshare

tag.description: optional group id of shared server

tag.name: param
tag.description: automaticly configure server

docblock.description: Removes a shared server IP from server

tag.description: IP you wish to unshare

tag.description: id of server you wish to retrieve ips for

tag.description: type of addresses to retrieve could be private/public or false for both types.

tag.description: returns json string of server addresses or false of failure

docblock.description: Retrieve back-up schedule for a specific server

tag.description: id of server you wish to retrieve back-up schedule for

docblock.description: Create a new back-up schedule for a server

tag.name: param
tag.description: id of a server this back-up schedule is intended for

tag.name: param
tag.description: day of the week this back-up should run, look at $backupSchedules array and/or documentation for valid parameters

tag.name: param
tag.description: time of the day this back-up should run, look at $backupSchedules array and/or documentation for valid parameters

tag.name: param
tag.description: should this scheduled back-up be enabled or disabled, default is set to enabled.

tag.name: return
tag.description: true on success and false on failure

docblock.description: Deletes scheduled back-up for specific server

tag.description: id of server you wish to delete all scheduled back-ups for

tag.description: returns true on success or false on failure

docblock.description: Creates a new server on the cloud

tag.description: server flavor you wish to use

tag.description: full file path where file will be put (/etc/motd,etc)

tag.description: content of the file (Welcome to my server, etc)

tag.name: return
tag.description: returns array of all files pending injection

tag.description: id of server you wish to update

tag.description: new server name

tag.name: param
tag.description: new server password

tag.name: return
tag.description: returns false on failure or server configuration on success

tag.description: id of server you wish to delete

tag.name: return
tag.description: returns true on success or false on fail
